___recognition.description: Your public or professional plaudits, kudos, awards, and other forms of positive external reinforcement.

___url.description: A webpage or other associated URL.

___title.description: Title of the award or recognition.

___category.description: Type of recognition: award, honor, prize, etc.

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___summary.description: A brief description of the recognition and why you received it.

___from.description: Name of the awarding company, insitution, or individual.

___extracurricular.description: Your involvement with industry-related events and enterprises outside of work. For example: attending conferences, workshops, hackathon or meetups.

___location.description: City, state, or other freeform location.

___url.description: A public URL to the extracurricular details.

___category.description: The category of the extracurricular experience. E.g conference, workshop, meetup, hackathon etc.

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___status.description: Patent status, e.g. pending or granted

___url.description: A public URL to the patent details.

___number.description: Number of the patent or patent application

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___date.description: Date of the patent granted, or application filed

___projects.description: The personal projects you worked on.

___images.description: Images and screenshots of the project

___big.description: The image in its original size

___thumbnail.description: Thumbnail of the image with 300px width and 300px height

___startDate.description: Date your work on the project began

___category.description: The type of the project. E.g. 'Software', 'iOs App', 'Mobile App', 'Desktop Software', 'API'

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___endDate.description: Date your work on the project ended

___summary.description: Project description and summary of your achievements and responsibilities on the project.

___governance.description: Your leadership, standards, board, and committee roles.

___category.description: Type of governance: committee, board, standards group, etc.

___keywords.description: Keywords associated with this governance stint.

___summary.description: Summary of your governance at this organization.

___organization.description: The name of the organization or group

___location.description: Freeform location of the event, e.g., 'San Francisco, CA' or 'Tokyo'.

___url.description: URL of the event website, or to a video of the presentation.

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___summary.description: A description of this speaking engagement.

___openSource.description: The open-source projects you worked on or contributed to.

___startDate.description: Date your involvement with project began

___category.description: The type of the project. E.g. 'Software', 'iOs App', 'Mobile App', 'Desktop Software', 'API'

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___endDate.description: Date your involvement with project ended

___summary.description: Project description and summary of your achievements and responsibilities on the project.

___basics.description: Your basic information like the name, a label, an image, summary, contact information, location information and social media profiles.

___name.description: Your name as it should appear on the resume.

___disposition.description: Your overall attitude towards new employment opportunities including: travel, relocation, schedule, desired type of work, work authorization (e.g. Visas)

___image.description: URL or path to your picture in JPEG, PNG, GIF, or BMP format.

___summary.description: A short description or summary of yourself.

___contact.description: Contact information, including phone numbers, emails, websites, IMs, and custom contact types.

___social.description: Social networking services and communities including GitHub, FaceBook, and the like.

___user.description: Your user name, number or identifier on this network.

___url.description: URL of your profile page on this network.

___network.description: The name of the social network.

___location.description: Location information, like address, country, region, city etc.

___label.description: Your label, e.g. 'Full-Stack Developer', 'Web Developer', 'iOS Developer'.

___interests.description: Your interests and enthusiasms outside of work.

___name.description: The name or title of the interest or hobby.

___summary.description: The description of the interest or hobby.

___affiliation.description: Your membership in groups, clubs, organizations, and professional associations whether at the collegiate, corporate, or personal level.

___location.description: Freeform location of the position, e.g., 'San Francisco, CA' or 'Tokyo'.

___startDate.description: Date your affiliation with the organization began

___category.description: The type of affiliation: club, group, organization, non-profit etc.

___endDate.description: Date your affiliation with the organization ended

___summary.description: A summary of your achievements and responsibilities during this affiliation.

___organization.description: The name of the organization or group.

___qualifications.description: Your qualifications for the job: e.g. certificates, test scores, continuing education, standalone programs and courses.

___url.description: A webpage or other associated URL.

___category.description: Type of qualification: test score, course, certificate, program etc.

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___summary.description: A brief description of the qualification and why you received it.

___from.description: Name of the company, insitution, individual or issuer of the qualification.

___service.description: Your overall service history in the true sense of the word 'service': volunteer work, military participation, civilian core, rescue and emergency services, and the like.

___location.description: Freeform location of the position, e.g., 'San Francisco, CA' or 'Tokyo'.

___category.description: The type of service work, such as volunteer or military.

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___summary.description: A summary of your achievements and responsibilities at this organization.

___organization.description: The service organization, such as Red Cross or National Guard.

___references.description: Your personal, professional, and/or technical references.

___name.description: The full name of the person giving the reference.

___role.description: The occupation of this reference, or his or her relationship to the candidate.

___reading.description: Your reading habits. It is intended to demonstrate familiarity with industry-relevant publications, blogs, books, or other media that a competent industry candidate should be expected to know.

___url.description: URL of the book, blog, or article.

___title.description: Title of the book, blog, or article.

___category.description: The type of reading: book, article, blog, magazine, series, etc.

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___author.description: Author of the book, blog, or article.

___summary.description: A brief description of the book, magazine, etc.

___name.description: Name of the skill: 'Programming', 'Frameworks', 'Programming Languages', 'Project Management' etc.

items.description: A keyword relating to this skill.

___languages.description: Your knowledge of world languages such as English, Spanish, or Chinese.

___language.description: The name of the language: English, Spanish, etc.

___level.description: Level of fluency with the language, e.g. 'elementary', 'limited-working', 'professional-working', 'full-professional', 'native-or-bilingual'

___employment.description: Your employment summary and list of employment history.

___location.description: Freeform location of the job or position, e.g., 'San Francisco, CA' or 'Tokyo'.

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___summary.description: A summary of your achievements and responsibilities under this employer.

___position.description: Your position or formal job title.

___writing.description: Your writing and publication history, from blogs and essays to novels and dissertations.

___url.description: Website or URL of this writing or publication.

___title.description: Title of the article, essay, or book.

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___summary.description: A brief summary of the publication.

___education.description: Your education summary and history, e.g. college and university

___location.description: Freeform location of the education, e.g., 'San Francisco, CA' or 'Tokyo'.

___url.description: Website or URL of the institution or school.

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

___summary.description: A short summary of this education experience.

___meta.description: Contains metadata information for the resume

___format.description: The canonical resume format and version. E.g. 'PROGRAMMERCV@1.0.0'.

___version.description: The semantic version number for this resume. E.g. 1.0.0
